name: BUGS Post Jam Edition
description:
Hello!

This game is about you, a miner, going deep into the caves of an asteroid in order to collect precious minerals...

But on your way down you get attacked by all kinds of nasty creatures and insects!

Unlock characters, get the highest score and upgrade your character!

Controls:

  • walking: ASD
  • Jumping: W
  • Shooting: Space
  • Aiming: Arrow keys
  • Special: Tab

Have fun!

Originally this game was made for the first Indie Tales Game Jam, but i decided to torture myself with all of the bad code i wrote during the jam and making a somewhat better and more polished version of the game.  There may still be bugs (pun intended) but it should be playable ;) (I do suggest playing the windows versions as it's the most stable i think.)
